name: SokoFrog
description:
SokoFrog is a puzzle game about pushing boxes,
push the boxes in their proper places to get to the next level, but be careful where you push your box so you don't break it

100 levels

there are 5 different maps, each with its own play style.

Credits:

Music: @graciettilive.
